aka: Márta Mészáros - Retrato de uma Diretora Húngara

director.name: 卡佳·拉加内利 Katja Raganelli
康拉德·威克勒 Konrad Wickler

this_title: Márta Mészáros – Portrait einer ungarischen Filmregisseurin
trans_title: Márta Mészáros - Retrato de uma Diretora Húngara
introduction: In 1978, German filmmaker Katja Raganelli set out for Budapest to capture Márta Mészáros at work on the set of her ninth feature, On The Move. The result is an intimate portrait of Mészáros's life and approach to her craft, featuring interviews with the director as well as close collaborators.
chinese_title: Márta Mészáros – Portrait einer ungarischen Filmregisseurin
